alert.note: Alert for Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Surry and Yadkin Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lone Hickory, or 7 miles southwest of Yadkinville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yadkinville... Boonville... East Bend... Nebo... Huntsville... Enon... and Lone Hickory. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
